overview: Nelly, Dan, Vann, Terry, and Jake together with Goerge, Danâ€™s balikbayan cousin, decided to conduct a research about vampirism and faith healing based from folk fanaticism and cultic practices. In pursuit for the answer to prove the existence of vampirism as a meidical condition, they ventured to the unknown palce to them San Esteban. The object of their study is to interview a cult leader and faith healer known as Amang Kulas.
title: Amalanhig: The Vampire Chronicle
